Name: Bunker Rush
About the game: your wife and you hide in a bunker after a chemical apolalipse. This is a bunker builder game.You need to eat vegetables, or drink some water to stay alive .NPC also need food and water.There's some craft recipes for surviveing the apocalypse.Your wife can work for you. Try to keep her alive.It's harder than you think. Good luck !
